name: Friends Forever: Choose your Story Choices 2018
name_original: Friends Forever: Choose your Story Choices 2018
description:
Friends Forever : Choose your Story Choices 2019 – Bringing fun stories to life!
You can now be the star of your own interactive and visually attractive tales! Progress through the stories, carving your own with your very own choices. From a teenage dating tale to a rom-com, from mystery to fantasy – there’s something for everyone!
With Friends Forever : Choose your Story Choices 2019, we now present stories with visuals and animations, which are punctuated by options popping up on your screen.
Make friends, hang out and flirt, try dating, or find love. From walking out on someone to deciding to stay – every episode is immersive, engaging, unique, and totally dependent on you. 👫
Choose your own responses and live a unique and adventure that is truly your own. Your answers will influence how every mystery episode unfolds. What’s your fantasy? Will you ever find a date for yourself? Will you marry and have a family or just flirt with all the boys in town? Will you find your mysterious killer? Will you find that happily ever after? Explore stories across genres with 10 unique titles – and more are soon to come!
Choose your story and be the leading character. Play now!

============================================
What’s Hot?
🔥 READ NOW: The Presence – A mysterious presence is haunting your niece. Will you be able to uncover the truth and save her before it is too late? A horror story where you find out if there is more to the world of living!
🔥 READ NOW: A Naughty Affair – An adventurous bachelorette, love at first sight and a vacation romance – a story packed with friendship, drama, and delightful surprises! Where will your choices lead you?
🔥 READ NOW: Celebrity Crush - Your dream comes true when you fly to LA, but will it last? Will your celeb crush make you popular? Read on...and make your choices wisely!
🔥 READ NOW: Love Wars: A tale where life brings you at a crossroad, do you follow your dreams even if they're filled with challenges, or you let go? Let's find out, as you enter a Love War!
🔥 READ NOW: Love Thy Neighbor: A new place always brings along some mysteriousness with it! Read on to discover more, but be careful in this neighborhood - deceit and manipulation are out to welcome you!
🔥 READ NOW: Love Coded - When you, a hard-code nerd meet a hotshot in Mr. Dylan Cole, you hope that there’s more on the table than just plain business. However, when your romance and the dating app is about to launch, something goes terribly wrong. Will you be able to get to the bottom of things and fight for what is yours? Read to find out more!
🔥 READ NOW: Town of Lies: A shift to your old hometown triggers a series of unexpected events. What’s keeping everyone on the edge? Dive into the life at Glennside which is full of drama, suspense and a touch of romance. Will you survive the nightmare and get to the truth? Read – Town of Lies, a thrilling tale that unfolds inconvenient truths.
🔥 READ NOW: The Switch - When Rebecca Coleman and Jessica Jones, two girls who have never met each other, decide to swap their homes, they get a little more than they’ve asked for, including falling in love!

===============================================
Features:
- Make friends, flirt, or go dating – it all depends on your choices! 👫
- Diverse gameplay allows for a lot of fun 🎮
- Choose your story - Multiple genres to choose from
- Well-written stories that will have you immersed and engaged
- There is no single right way to progress
- Encounter different adventures every time you play!
Download Now!
